# Introduction {-}

These are the official bylaws for [Cedars Christian School](https://cedarschristian.org) in Bloomington, Indiana. You can always find the latest version at https://bylaws.cedarschristian.org. A printable, PDF version can be downloaded [here](ccs-bylaws.pdf), and an epub version suitable for e-readers can be downloaded [here](ccs-bylaws.epub).

A record of changes can be found in the [Updates](updates.html) section at the end of the book.

THESE BYLAWS ARE SUBJECT TO ARBITRATION PURSUANT TO THE [INDIANA CODE SECTION 34-57-2-1 ET SEQ](https://iga.in.gov/legislative/laws/2022/ic/titles/034#34-57-2-1).

**Contact us:**

We are currently hosted by [Trinity Reformed Church](https://trinityreformed.org) at the following address:

2401 S. Endwright Road  
Bloomington, Indiana 47403  

[Please get in touch!](https://cedarschristian.org/contact-us/)
